title: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Acanthus Leaf and Urn", 1940–44
medium: Brush and blue and mauve gouache; red colored pencil on newsprint
inscribed: Recto: in red colored pencil, lower right: "Acanthus and Urns"
provenance: From the office of Alexander H. Girard
description: Alternating motif of leaf and eight petal flower with urns.  Leaves are mauve with left side filled in.  Urns are blue with only the bases filled in, flowers are blue with alternate petals filled in.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Acanthus Leaf and Urn", 1940–44.Brush and blue and mauve gouache; red colored pencil on newsprint. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-189.
